question: This country has become the top source market for Dubai.
explanation: India has become the top source market for Dubai, with 2.1 million visitors in 2017, as per data published by Dubai's Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing (Dubai Tourism). The data regarding this was published by Dubai's Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing (Dubai Tourism). In 2017, Dubai had experienced 15 % growth in tourist arrivals from India. India has also become the first country to exceed 2 million visitors in a single year. This increase has been credited to Dubai Tourism's collaboration with actor Shah Rukh Khan in the 'BeMyGuest' campaign. Saudi Arabia (KSA) secured the second place with 1.53 million tourists in 2017. UK secured third position with 1.27 million tourists.
